title: Elo booster. Busted but hey let him keep boosting?
body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=istypuff

[REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] This player is not only normally Bronze 5. But as of 4 days a go... 
Some how is about to go to gold 5.
WITH IN 5 DAYS!

So many people have reported the booster... But yet. NOTHING.
So is boosting okay now? We are allowed now?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
No boosting isn't ok, and chances are that very quickly that account will lose all current and previous ranked rewards, receive a 14 day ban, and lose all rewards associated with honour as a result.

As far as I know they run boosting bans in pretty regular ban waves, though I'm not sure on that, or if the way they do things changes with the uptick of boosters at season end.

If you think the post game reports aren't being picked up, submit a report to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They can't tell you anything about another player's account, so you'll get a generic "thanks for your report, keep using post game reporting" type response, but they can look into it and make sure the account is being picked up as it should be.

If a high ranked diamond/masters player jumped on a new account, was in your game and made you go 0/20 because he's smurfing, should they be banned too? Maybe take the time you use on the internet to look at videos on how to become better and then beat the boosters.
Your comparision is missed the point by a large margin. Playing on a new account and going from a bronze with 25% to 90% win rate, is not the same case.

It isn't. A "New player" that jumps on a bought unranked account, goes 7-3 in placements or so and climbs from silver/gold and makes you go 0/10. You would still complain and whinge. Because instead of eating it and trying to get better to outcarry someone else, let's all just cry in all chat about it.

>Because instead of eating it and trying to get better to outcarry someone else, let's all just cry in all chat about it.

Can you even comprehend the discussion that is taking place here? This is not about performance. This is about boosters servicing intended accounts, to raise it higher for, friend or money, ECT...
And that person IS NOT GETTING BOOSTED. Their match history is terrible. Boosters go 20/0 every game 95 percent of the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Give me a heheXD,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=KImE37lW,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-31T22:27:32.144+0000)
>
> And that person IS NOT GETTING BOOSTED. Their match history is terrible. Boosters go 20/0 every game 95 percent of the time.

LOL
They went from 25% win rate to 90% win rate.
They never played Victor or graves before EVER!!
But some how went 22KDA and 26KDA.

Oh wait. You are the booster or the boosted one. I added the player to laugh at them. To tell them they got reported. Also to tell them I hope they use " ChangedmyIPaddress " or some kind of program like that also. 
Now this post. WAHAHAH Damn suspect!
